Package org.prithvidiamond1.SlashCommands.Customizers

Class SlashCommandCustomizer

java.lang.Object
org.prithvidiamond1.SlashCommands.Customizers.SlashCommandCustomizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SlashCommandCustomizerInterface, SlashCommandOptionCustomizer, SlashCommandSubCommandCustomizer
public class SlashCommandCustomizer extends Object implements SlashCommandCustomizerInterface
This class contains methods to customize slash commands by implementing SlashCommandCustomizerInterface
